original_text: And Jephthah vowed a vow unto the Lord, and said, If thou shalt without fail deliver the children of Ammon into mine hands,
korean_text: 그가 여호와께 서원하여 이르되 주께서 과연 암몬 자손을 내 손에 넘겨 주시면

sentences.original_text: And Jephthah vowed a vow unto the Lord
If thou shalt without fail deliver
the children of Ammon into mine hands
